title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders that indicate them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which makes them stand out even more.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should not use text fields on motif platforms. The text fields should not have automatic borders, and the backgrounds should be consistent with the rest of the page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a project. 
2. Right-click and select Properties. 
3. Navigate to the Info page. 
4. Observe the readonly fields (such as Path, Type, etc.) with text fields.
